entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 8:31 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 8:31 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the evening then west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 8:31 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
